GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_INVCLICK100_DESC: Gain ideas from the inventor 100 times
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_LEARNTECH_DESC: Invent 5 technologies after a single click on the inventor
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_LEMONS_DESC: Have 5 lemon trees in your garden
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_OFFLINE_NAME: We work even when you don't
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_PRESTIGEGAIN128_DESC: Earn 128 prestige after a single restart
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_SKYSCRAPERS_NAME: I can see another city from here
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_SWARM_DESC: Let your bees peform 1000000 flights to the flowers
GROUP_farm_achievements.TXID_ACH_WATER1000_DESC: Keep 1000 water in the Water tower

GROUP_farm_artifacts.TXID_CURR_DESC_ADSSKIPS: you can skip ads view and still receive a bonus
GROUP_farm_artifacts.TXID_CURR_DESC_GEMS: Can be used for powerful boosts

GROUP_farm_game_elements.TXID_CAP_ROLLBACKUPINFO: You can roll back the upgrade and receive

GROUP_farm_game_elements.TXID_MSGCAP_RESTARTWARNING: You are going to restart the building
GROUP_farm_game_elements.TXID_MSG_RESTART_NOWGET_BEG: If you restart now, you will get
GROUP_farm_game_elements.TXID_MSG_RESTART_POPIF_BEG: If you grow the population up to
GROUP_farm_game_elements.TXID_WORLDDESC_FARMANDMINE: Grow food, sell it, invent, develop industry and grow your city

GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_BELLOWS: Can increase the efficiency of Forge
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_BRICK: Can make bricks and construct buildings
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_CATS: Cats will appear in the village, boosting various facilities
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_FISHING: Fish will be added to the food resources
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_FOUNDRY: Can produces iron from coal and iron ore
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_GASMAKING: Enables production of fuel from oil
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_LEMONADE: Can produce lemonade from lemons, sugar and ice
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_MARKETING: Increases amount of sales by 1 per level
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_METEO: Can build weather station which generates ideas
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_MINEENGINE: Can construct engine which powers the mine
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_TRANSMISSION: Can connect the steam engine to the distand receivers
GROUP_farm_inventions.TXID_INVDESC_WEATHER: Lets you call the rain to water the fields

GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_APIARY: Keeps bees who produce honey and pollinate trees and flowers
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BANK: Generates money for use after restart
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BEEKEEPER: Takes care of the bees at the apiary
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BELLOWS: Blows air to the forge furnace, thus increasing its efficiency
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BRIDGE: Lets you expand to the other river bank
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_CAT: Boosts various facilities, and does it even more when purring
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_FOREST: Source of wood, depletes quickly but restores slowly
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_FOUNDRY: Produces iron from iron ore and coal
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GARDENER: Gathers fruit and help lemons ripe faster
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GROCERY: Stores various types of food  for selling
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GROCERYCASHIER: Sells food from the grocery store
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_LEMONADEMAKER: Produces lemonade from lemons, sugar and ice
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_LIBRARY: Generates ideas for use after restart
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_MILKPUMP: Delivers milk along the underground pipes from the cow to the factory
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_MINEDRILL: Increases the depth of the mine
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_OIL: Takes oil from the deposit to the surface
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_RIVERBERTH: You can take water here to water the fields
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_STEAMENGINE: Powers the work of the mine elevator
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TRACKTOR: Automatically performs all the work on the fields
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TRANSMB: Connects the bellows to the steam engine
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TRANSMD: Connects the drill to the steam engine
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TRANSMO: Transfers power from the Steam engine to the Oil pump
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TRANSM_GEN: Transfers power from the Steam engine to the machines
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WATERTOWER: Stores water which can be delivered to the fields from the standpipes
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WATERWELL: Automatically waters the field (if there is water inside the water tower)
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WATERWHEEL: Fills the water tower with water
GROUP_farm_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WOODSTORAGE: Stores Wood. Wood can be sold from it

GROUP_farm_messages_from_game_elements.TXID_COW_MILK: Tap the cow to milk it
GROUP_farm_messages_from_game_elements.TXID_COW_OPENDOORS_IN: Tap the cowshed to let the cow in
GROUP_farm_messages_from_game_elements.TXID_COW_OPENDOORS_OUT: Tap the cowshed to let the cow out

GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTCOLICKEREXPL: Look, the game has an integrated autoclicker! Just tap an object once, and it will be working while you are relaxing. How convenient!
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTOCLICKER: You might want to place the autoclicker on one object or another, depending on which one currently needs additional power the most.
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTOMATEOTHER: The seller will work automatically. And you can get back to the farm to produce more vegetables in the meanwhile
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_BACK2FARMAFTERCLAY: Let's return to the farm to grow more food and earn more money in the meanwhile
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_BERTHTAP: Plants need water to grow. Tap the berth to start delivering the water from the river
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_BUILDHOUSE: Let's build more houses to accommodate more people
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_BUYCLAYPIT: Now you can buy a Clay pit. It produces clay, which is needed to produce bricks and build houses
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CANHIREFARMERS: You can hire a farmer now
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CHOP: Tap the Forest to chop wood. Chopping will go on automatically
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CLAYLATER: We will need clay and bricks when we reach the population limits
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CONVTAP: Tap the conveyor belt to transport the clay to the bricks factory
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_FARMANAGAIN: Let's get back to the farm to grow and harvest more food
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_FARMGATHERTAP: The farm has crops ready to be harvested. Tap the farm to dig and harvest the vegetables
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_FARMSEEDTAP: Soil is ready! Tap the farm to seed plants
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_FARMTRANSPORTTAP: Tap the basket to deliver the gathered vegetables to the storage
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_FIRSTEARNINGS: You have earned money and the population has grown!
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_INDUSTRY: Industry allows you to build houses to accommodate more people and to produce goods
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_INVENTOREXPL: Sometimes inventors walk along the streets. Click them to collect ideas and unlock new inventions
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_LOOKINDUSTRY: Let's look at the mining part
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_LUMBERMILL: Tap the lumbermill to produce desks quicker. Work will go on automatically
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MARKET: You can sell resources at the market
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_NAVIGATION: You can drag the screen or scale it to see all the facilities
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_PITTAP: Tap the clay pit to mine clay
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_POPCAP: The population has reached its limits
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_POPULATIONEXPL: Every population growth brings you new workforce. And population grows when you sell food
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_PRODUCEBRICKS: Tap the tent to produce bricks quicker. Work will go on automatically
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_RESTART: Check which bonuses will you gain if you restart the building
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_SELLTAP: Now when we have the vegetables in the storage, tap the market to sell them and earn money
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_SHEDTAP: Let's start preparing the soil. Tap the shed to start ploughing the field
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_TODOEXPL: Complete the tasks and earn valuable resources
GROUP_farm_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_UPGRADESEXPL: Population growth provides you workforce. You can spend workforce to hire workers and spend money to upgrade facilities

GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_ASKALLOWPERSADS: Would you allow showing personalized ads to you?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_ASKALLOWPERSADSEXPL: This will make ads more relevant and it won't bother you (you can watch it only when you want to receive a reward in the game)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_BACKUPSEXPLANATION: Backup lets you store and revert your current game world, while it has no effect on the currencies which are linked to your account (Rubies)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_BREAKCODE: Guess the code to get your weekly gift
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_FINDHINTS: Find the hints inside the game or...
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_GETMORECODESINDISCORD: Get more codes in our Discord
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_MAKEBACKUPS: You can backup your tower to load it later
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_PENDINGMSG: Thank you for making purchase! When the transaction completes processing, the purchase will become available
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_RATEGAME: Could you, please, leave a public review to let more people find the game?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_REWARD2TESTER: During the development we have changed the game core, so, you have fresh start. But we give you a boost to regain your progress faster
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_SMALLQUESTION: I want to ask you one small question...
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_TELLWHY: Would you, please, suggest some ways how to make it enjoyable?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_THANKS2TESTER: Thank you so much for being the very first tester of this game!
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_TODOMAX: You have the maximum number of tasks. Complete or discard them to get new ones
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_TODOREPLACEIN: You'll be able to replace the task in:
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_WOULDYOULIKE2BUY: Would you like to buy more?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_ALREADYUSED: You have already used this code
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_EXPIRED: This code has expired or not yet active
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_NOEFFECT: At the current game state the code will not have any effect. Please, try again later
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_ONLYNUMBERS: Code must have only numbers and latin letters
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_WRONGPLAYER: This gift is for another player
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_WRONGVERSION: This code is for newer game version. Please, update the game
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_WRONGWORLD: This code is for another game world (maybe)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_DISCORDSUGGESTIONS: You can check the results and current suggestions in our community
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_GDPR_APPLE_ADD_ALT: As you continue you will be able to select your tracking preferences
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_GDPR_EXPLANATION: The game uses the players data (ads cookies and usage statistics) to enhance the gameplay and serve relevant ads to stay free. Please, accept our terms of use and privacy policy (or let your legal guardian agree if you are below the age of consent)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_LASTLOADATTEMPT: Last time there was an error
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_CREDITSAUTHORS: Game by Airapport team Alexey Izvalov & Nadiia Serbina © 2020 All rights reserved
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_NEXTRUNBOOSTS: On the next run you'll have such boosts
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_RESTART_BOOST_CAP: You have the following boosts now:
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_RESTART_QUESTION: Do you really want to restart the building?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_VICTORY: Victory! You reached the highest designed level! You can keep building beyond this limit, or play other games by Airapport
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_CLIPBOARD: Text file was copied to clipboard. You can store it somewhere or email to yourself to be able to restore the tower
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMOREAFTERADS: Would you like to gain more after watching ads?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMOREGAINSEXPL: (only gains, not spends, will be doubled)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMORESKIPADS: Would you like to gain more (without ads)?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_HOWTOIMPROVE: Suggestions how to improve the game
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_MUSTIMPORTFROMCLIPBOARD: Before importing please select the save text string and copy it to clipboard
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_NOTASAVETEXT: The file you copied to clipboards is not a proper save file
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_REWARD_READY: You have received an unexpected gift! Check, what it is
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_SLOTTAKENCONFIRM: This slot is already taken. Do you really want to rewrite it?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_SORRYSAVE: Sorry, we were unable to load the save
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_TEXTAFTERSCREENSHOTOK: Now the players' community can admire your achievement
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_WRONGSAVEOPTIONS: Here is what you can do before restarting the game:
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_YOUCANREVERT2BACKUP: If you want, you can roll back to the previous save
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_PHRASE_ARTIFACTS_END: artifacts. Check if you can buy more
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_REP_TASK_QUEST: Do you really want to replace this task?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SAVEDATA: Appreciate your help! This is your save data. Please, select it all (long press -> select all), copy (long press -> copy) and send in email to the developer: dev@airapport.com
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND: Looks like the game crashed last time. You can try loading this save again or send the data to the developer. We will look at it and fix as soon as possible. You can also completely restart the game if you don't want to wait
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND_COPIEDSAVEDATA: The text with your save data was copied to clipboard
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND_SAVEDATA: Please, send it by email to the developer: dev@airapport.com
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_UMP_ADSONLYREW: Game does not show ads without your approval
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_UMP_CONSENTEXPL: Please, give your consent to let the game load advertisement which will provide rewards.
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_VOTERESULT: Thank you! You vote has been accounted.

GROUP_www_airapport_games.TXID_GAMEDESC_IDLETOWERBUILDER: Build the tower to the sky and beyond!
